text:
<@U0260V1BX>, here's the charging animation demo... should perfectly mirror everything in the final designs. I'll jam on intro animation exports now.

<https://www.dropbox.com/s/wtl54krsgwa10pe/FinalChargingAnimation_Demo.mp4?dl=0>
<@U026E0ZNR> lets pause on the intro animation
as i realize the bg image is still FPO
and ewald has some placeholder shots that may work
he'll send them to you - can you take a look and see what works well?
<https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/9358518/Energous_Web.zip>
see if any of those work
if you treat them in similar format
Yep I'll look through as soon as they download
cool
thanks <@U026E0ZNR>

<@U0260V1BX>, <@U0265G76F>, this is the photo I think does the best job for the splash screen. People's faces get too obscured by the logo lines.  One mockup for iPhone 5, one for iPhone 6 Plus. let me know how you both feel.

<https://www.dropbox.com/s/x467aatttssllca/SelectSplashScreen_i5_1.png?dl=0>

<https://www.dropbox.com/s/vvap04j4zrq8f3v/SelectSplashScreen_i6Plus_1.png?dl=0>
As soon as I hear from you guys I can plug that image into AE for sequence rendering and get an ETA for Wibke
I think it works well, esp at 6 size
Let's run with it
Thanks sir
Got it. Thanks.
I'm gonna eat lunch, I should be done with exporting around 3ish.
K. Thx
Thanks Trent. Would you mind exporting new bg image assets for iOS and android as well? I've been using the uncorked android export script for that. Sorry- bad day for me to be in an all day meeting
Yeah I have to export those images anyway to properly fit them into the animation sequences. I'll bundle them up with everything else.
thank you
I've got all the intro sequences exported but will need some extra time to compress them w/ a program Gaston gave me to reduce file sizes.
k, thanks
These sequences are pretty large for hi res devices. 63 mb before compression for the 1440 Android phone.
lets just give it to them
we can recommend that if it affects performance they should remove it
Ok. I'm exporting a backup MP4 clip by the recommendation of both Scott and Evans. So we'll have that. Sorry for the delay.
no problem
thanks
hey <@U026E0ZNR> whats the ETA on those animations?
Uploading to the NAS now
cool. i have to leave in 10min for a dentist appt and want to make sure i can toss it on the hub before then
bc i cant seem to find my hub login to share with you guys
and for some reason only i have access :simple_smile:
The one thing I won't have is the Android updated BG at the different dpi
I have it set up just for the target devices and forgot to do the smaller ones.
ah ok
i've only given them 2 sizes actually
for android
to fit the target devices
I have those.
so i think no need to worry about the other resolutions
Ok. Cool they are located...
Motion: NAS > clients > Ziba > Energous > Motion > Intro Animation > _folders_
BG/Splash Assets: NAS > clients > Ziba > Energous > Design > WattUp Sprint 3 Design Deliverables > Extra Assets > _folders_
can you do me a favor and also upload to dropbox
Sure, all those deliverables?
actually no - the upload started out super slow but its speeding up
(on the hub)
So you're good?
yes!
thank you!
:smile:
Cool, just want to be sure. Thanks!

Oh, I'm sure you're about gone by now <@U0260V1BX>, but one important piece of info I keep forgetting. We need to communicate to Shailendra that all PNG/JPG sequences are exported at 24 fps. He doesn't know this and I think will need it to get animation flow right.
